```{r Setup, echo=FALSE}
require(ggplot2)
require(stringr)
require(plyr)
require(lubridate)
options(error=recover)
setwd("K:\\Development\\Components")
# setwd("C:\\Users\\Greg Sanders\\Documents\\Development\\Components")
Path<-"K:\\2007-01 PROFESSIONAL SERVICES\\R scripts and data\\"
# Path<-"C:\\Users\\Greg Sanders\\SkyDrive\\Documents\\R Scripts and Data SkyDrive\\"
source(paste(Path,"lookups.r",sep=""))
source(paste(Path,"helper.r",sep=""))

axis.text.size<-12
strip.text.size<-12
legend.text.size<-8
# table.text.size<-5.75
title.text.size<-12
geom.text.size<-12

main.text.size<-2
note.text.size<-1.40


Coloration<-read.csv(
    paste(Path,"Lookups\\","lookup_coloration.csv",sep=""),
    header=TRUE, sep=",", na.strings="", dec=".", strip.white=TRUE, 
    stringsAsFactors=FALSE
    )

Coloration<-ddply(Coloration
                  , c(.(R), .(G), .(B))
                  , transform
                  , ColorRGB=as.character(
                      if(min(is.na(c(R,G,B)))) {NA} 
                      else {rgb(max(R),max(G),max(B),max=255)}
                      )
                  )
```

```{r DateEntryAndProcessing, echo=FALSE}
zipfile<-unz("Data\\Defense_Summary_SP_FundingMechanismHistoryBucketPSRSubCustomerRegime.zip",
        "Defense_Summary_SP_FundingMechanismHistoryBucketPSRSubCustomerRegime.csv")

PSRRegime  <- read.csv(
    "Data//Defense_Vendor_SP_VendorSizeHistoryBucketSubCustomerRegime.csv",
    header = TRUE, sep = ",", dec = ".", strip.white = TRUE, 
    na.strings = c("NULL","NA",""),
    stringsAsFactors = TRUE
    )




PSRRegime<-apply_lookups(Path,PSRRegime)
names(PSRRegime)
str(PSRRegime)
PSRRegime$USDATL<-factor(PSRRegime$USDATL,levels=c("GANSLER+","ALDRIDGE","WYNNE","KRIEG","YOUNG", "CARTER","KENDALL" ),ordered=TRUE )
PSRRegime<-subset(PSRRegime,USDATL %in% c("YOUNG","CARTER","KENDALL"))

PSRRegime$Graph<-TRUE

PSRRegime$SignedQuarter<-as.Date(
    paste(as.numeric(format(PSRRegime$SignedMonth, "%Y"))+
              floor(as.numeric(format(PSRRegime$SignedMonth,"%m"))/10),
          (floor((as.numeric(format(PSRRegime$SignedMonth, "%m"))-1)/3)*3+4) %% 12,
          1
          ,sep="-"),"%Y-%m-%d")-1

PSRRegime$SubCustomer.component<-droplevels(PSRRegime$SubCustomer.component)
PSRRegime$SubCustomer.component<-factor(PSRRegime$SubCustomer.component,
                                           levels=c("Army","Navy","Air Force","DLA",
                                                    "MDA","MilitaryHealth",
                                                    "Additional DoD Components"),
                                           labels=c("Army","Navy","Air Force","DLA",
                                                    "MDA","Military\nHealth",
                                                    "Additional\nDoD\nComponents"),
                                           ordered=TRUE)

```


```{r PSRATLregime}
ATLregimeFYear<-aggregate(PSRRegime$Obligation.2014
                          , by=list(PSRRegime$Fiscal.Year,
                                    #                                                   PSRRegime$SubCustomer.component,
                                    PSRRegime$USDATL)
                          ,FUN = "sum"
                          ,na.rm =TRUE
                          )

names(ATLregimeFYear)<-c("Fiscal.Year","USDATL","AnnualRegimeObligations")
PSRUSDATL<-subset(PSRRegime,join(PSRRegime,ATLregimeFYear)$AnnualRegimeObligations>=50)


ATLregimeDetails<-data.frame(USDATL= 'GANSLER+',
                             StartDate=as.Date('1997/11/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                             EndDate=as.Date('2001/05/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'ALDRIDGE',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2001/05/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2003/05/22' ,format='%Y/%m/%d') ))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'WYNNE',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2003/05/23' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2005/06/05' ,format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'KRIEG',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2005/06/06' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2007/07/19' ,format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'YOUNG',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2007/07/20' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2009/04/26',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'CARTER',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2009/04/27',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2011/11/02',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'KENDALL' ,
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2011/11/03',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=max(PSRRegime$SignedQuarter)))



ATLregimeDetails$StartFiscalYear<-ymd(paste(year(ATLregimeDetails$StartDate)+
                                                ifelse(month(ATLregimeDetails$StartDate)<10,-1,0)
                                            ,"-10-1",sep=""))



PSRUSDATL<-join(PSRUSDATL,ATLregimeDetails,match="first")


PSRUSDATL$Fiscal.Year[PSRUSDATL$Fiscal.Year>PSRUSDATL$EndDate&
                             PSRUSDATL$SignedMonth<=PSRUSDATL$EndDate]<-
    PSRUSDATL$EndDate[PSRUSDATL$Fiscal.Year>PSRUSDATL$EndDate&
                             PSRUSDATL$SignedMonth<=PSRUSDATL$EndDate]

PSRUSDATL$Fiscal.Year[PSRUSDATL$Fiscal.Year<PSRUSDATL$StartDate]<-
    PSRUSDATL$StartDate[PSRUSDATL$Fiscal.Year<PSRUSDATL$StartDate]


```



```{r PSRUSDATLmonthlyComponents}        

png(
    paste( "Output\\PSR_sum\\",paste("DoD_components"
                                         ,"Obligation_2014"
                                         ,"PSR_sum"
                                         ,"USDATL"
                                         ,"6monthMovingAverage"
                                         ,sep="_"
                                         )
           ,".png"
           , sep=""
           )
    , type="cairo"
    , width=7.5
    , height=10
    , units='in'
    , pointsize=12
    , res=150
    )

# debug(LatticePercentLineWrapper)

PSRGraph<-LatticePercentLineWrapper(
    "Produce/Service/R&D"
    ,""#Produce/Service/R&D by DoD Component and Starting Regime"
    ,"Month of Obligation (6 Month Lagging Average)"
    ,"% of Component Obligations"
    ,Coloration
    ,PSRUSDATL
    ,NULL
    ,"SignedMonth"
    ,"Obligation.2014"
    ,"ServicesCategory.sum"
    ,"SubCustomer.component"
    ,"USDATL"
    ,"StartDate"
    ,"EndDate"
    ,MovingAverage=6
    )

PSRGraph<-PSRGraph+aes(size=y.variable)
# PSRGraph+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(StartDate)))+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(EndDate)))
PSRGraph<-PSRGraph+geom_rect(aes(xmin=StartDate, xmax=EndDate, ymin=-Inf, ymax=Inf),color="red",alpha=0,size=1)
PSRGraph<-PSRGraph+coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0, 1))+scale_y_continuous(labels = percent_format())+
    theme(legend.position="bottom",axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
    scale_x_date(labels=date_format("'%y"),breaks=date_breaks("year")) 
PSRGraph
print(PSRGraph)
#     PSRGraph+scale_fill_manual(values = alpha(c("red","blue"), .3))
while(!(dev.cur()[[1]]==1)){
    dev.off()
    }

```

```{r PSRATLpolicy}
PSRPolicy<-PSRRegime
PSRPolicy$ATLpolicy<-as.character(PSRRegime$USDATL)
PSRPolicy$ATLpolicy[PSRPolicy$USDATL=="CARTER"]<-"CARTER pre-\nSection 808"
PSRPolicy$ATLpolicy[PSRPolicy$BBP1==1]<-"BBP1"
PSRPolicy$ATLpolicy[PSRPolicy$ServicesRestriction==1]<-"Section 808\nFY12 NDAA\nImplem."

# PSRPolicy$ATLpolicy[PSRPolicy$ITFsmallBusiness==1]<-"Small Business\nTask Force"
# PSRPolicy$ATLpolicy[PSRPolicy$BBP2==1]<-"BBP2"

PSRPolicy$ATLpolicy[PSRPolicy$BBP3==1]<-"BBP3"

PSRPolicy$ATLpolicy<-factor(PSRPolicy$ATLpolicy,levels=c("GANSLER+","ALDRIDGE","WYNNE","KRIEG","YOUNG", "CARTER\npre-BBP","BBP1","Section 808\nFY12 NDAA\nImplem.","BBP3" ),ordered=TRUE )
# 
# ATLpolicyFYear<-aggregate(PSRPolicy$Obligation.2014
#                           , by=list(PSRPolicy$Fiscal.Year,
#                                     #                                                   PSRRegime$SubCustomer.component,
#                                     PSRPolicy$ATLpolicy)
#                           ,FUN = "sum"
#                           ,na.rm =TRUE
#                           )
# 
# 
# 
# names(ATLpolicyFYear)<-c("Fiscal.Year","ATLpolicy","AnnualPolicyObligations")
# PSRPolicy<-subset(PSRPolicy,join(PSRPolicy,ATLpolicyFYear)$AnnualPolicyObligations>=50)
# 

ATLpolicyDetails<-data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'GANSLER+',
                             StartDate=as.Date('1997/11/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                             EndDate=as.Date('2001/05/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'ALDRIDGE',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2001/05/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2003/05/22' ,format='%Y/%m/%d') ))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'WYNNE',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2003/05/23' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2005/06/05' ,format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'KRIEG',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2005/06/06' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2007/07/19' ,format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'YOUNG',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2007/07/20' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2009/04/26',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'CARTER\npre-BBP',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2009/04/27',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2010/09/22',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
# ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'Small Business\nTask Force',
#                                                     StartDate=as.Date('2010/09/23',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
#                                                     EndDate=as.Date('2013/04/23',format='%Y/%m/%d')))

ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'BBP1',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2010/11/03',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2012/07/30',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
# ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'WSARA regs',
#                                                     StartDate=as.Date('2011/03/16',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
#                                                     EndDate=as.Date('2013/04/23',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
# ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'BBP2',
#                                                     StartDate=as.Date('2013/04/24',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
#                                                     EndDate=as.Date('2014/09/18',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'Section 808\nFY12 NDAA\nImplem.',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2012/07/31',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2014/09/18',format='%Y/%m/%d')))

ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'BBP3',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2014/09/19',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=max(PSRRegime$SignedQuarter)))




ATLpolicyDetails$StartFiscalYear<-ymd(
    paste(year(ATLpolicyDetails$StartDate)+
              ifelse(month(ATLpolicyDetails$StartDate)<10,-1,0)
          ,"-10-1",sep=""))


PSRPolicy<-join(PSRPolicy,ATLpolicyDetails,match="first")

PSRPolicy<-subset(PSRPolicy,ATLpolicy!='BBP3') #Not enough to include

PSRPolicy$Fiscal.Year[PSRPolicy$Fiscal.Year>PSRPolicy$EndDate&
                             PSRPolicy$SignedMonth<=PSRPolicy$EndDate]<-
    PSRPolicy$EndDate[PSRPolicy$Fiscal.Year>PSRPolicy$EndDate&
                             PSRPolicy$SignedMonth<=PSRPolicy$EndDate]
```

```{r PSRPolicyMonthlyComponentSolitary}

for (c in unique(PSRPolicy$SubCustomer)){    
    png(
        paste( "Output\\PSR_sum\\",c,"\\",CleanFileName(paste(
            c
            ,"Obligation_2014"
            ,"PSR_sum"
            ,"ATLpolicy"
            ,"6monthMovingAverage"
            ,sep="_"
            ))
            ,".png"
            , sep=""
            )
        , type="cairo"
        , width=10
        , height=5
        , units='in'
        , pointsize=12
        , res=150
        )
    
    PSRGraph<-LatticePercentLineWrapper(
        VAR.name="Produce/Service/R&D"
        ,VAR.proper.name=""#paste(c,"Produce/Service/R&D by Starting Regime")
        ,VAR.X.label="Month of Obligation (6 Month Lagging Average)"
        ,VAR.Y.label=paste("% of ",c," Obligations")
        ,VAR.Coloration=Coloration
        
        
        ,VAR.long.DF=subset(PSRPolicy,SubCustomer==c)
        ,VAR.ncol=NA
        ,VAR.x.variable="SignedMonth"
        ,VAR.y.variable="Obligation.2014"
        ,VAR.y.series=    "ServicesCategory.sum"
        ,VAR.facet.primary="ATLpolicy"
        ,VAR.facet.secondary=NA
        ,"StartDate"
        ,"EndDate"
        ,MovingAverage=6
        )
    
    PSRGraph<-PSRGraph+aes(size=y.variable)+scale_size_continuous(name="Constant 2014 $ Obligated, Billions")
    # PSRGraph+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(StartDate)))+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(EndDate)))
    PSRGraph<-PSRGraph+geom_rect(aes(xmin=StartDate, xmax=EndDate, ymin=-Inf, ymax=Inf),color="red",alpha=0,size=1)
    PSRGraph<-PSRGraph+coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0, 1))+scale_y_continuous(labels = percent_format())+
        theme(legend.position="bottom",axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
        scale_x_date(labels=date_format("'%y"),breaks=date_breaks("year"))
    PSRGraph
    print(PSRGraph)
    rm(PSRGraph)
    #     PSRGraph+scale_fill_manual(values = alpha(c("red","blue"), .3))
    while(!(dev.cur()[[1]]==1)){
        dev.off()
        }
    }
```
